answers.answer: Depends a lot on how old you are. After 40 vision decreases every decade. Vision may also be affected by your general health ie diabetes, high blood pressure, thyroid etc.  If you have seen several leading OPHTHALMOLOGIST ( not optometrists) then your eyes are likely not seriously diseasedJCH MD

question: hey all,I have been using specs since my childhood and wearing a -3 spherical power spectacles since 5 years.The problem is that i now cant see objects with the same sharpness as i used to before.I had an eye test too and that to several times within last 15 days from leading doctors but they all say that all is fine. The doctors also tried to increase the power and see if some change is there but all in vain. -3 power seems fine with me  and moreover I pass all the tests they do with the same but somehow i feel i am not having that sharpness in my vision.please please please help me out.I am totally confused.. :-(note: i never use contact lenses. only glasses
title: sharpness in vision
